63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Once an Ansari woman, accompanied by a son of hers, came to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ). Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) spoke to her and said twice, "By Him in Whose Hand my life is, you are the most beloved people to me

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم لِلأَنْصَارِ " أَنْتُمْ أَحَبُّ النَّاسِ إِلَىَّ "
chapter.eng-name: “You are from the most beloved people to me.”
